page.title: 20CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: {SKIPPING}I ENJOY SKIPPING WITH MY FRIENDS.YOU GET IN THE MIDDLE AND THE OTHER PEOPLE TURN THE ROPE.WHEM THE ROPE COMES TO YOUR FEET YOU JUMP EVERY TIME IT COMES AROUND.IF YOU WANT YOU CAN SING A SONG TO GO WITH IT.WHEN YOU JUMP SAY "HIGH LOW DOLLY ROCKER" UNTIL THE PERSON WHO'S SKIPPING, TRIPS. {KING,CAN,COPPER}YOU HAVE A CAN AND SOMEONE'S IT.YOU GO AND HIDE.THE PERSON WHO'S"IT"COUNTS TO 50 AND TRIES TO FIND YOU.IF WHEN HE IS LOOKING FOR YOU, YOU KICK THE CAN,HE TRIES TO GET THE CAN BACK BEFORE YOU HAVE HIDDEN AGAIN.IF HE DOES, YOU ARE "IT". {BASE CHASE}THE IDEA IS TO SET YOUR TEAM FREE FOR AS LONG AS YOU CAN.ONE PERSON IS "IT".THE REST RUN AWAY FROM HIM.IF THE PERSON WHO IS "IT" TOUCHES YOU, YOU MUST SIT BACK AT THE PLACE FROM WHERE YOU STARTED. TO SET YOU FREE ANOTHER PERSON HAS TO TOUCH YOU.
